data.event: The Hamilton County Courthouse was built in 1897, and was added to the National Register of Historic Places in April, 1980.

event.title: was added to the National Register of Historic Places in April, 1980

data.event: The Hamilton County Courthouse was built in 1897, and was added to the National Register of Historic Places in April, 1980.

event.title: operated a ranch near Hamilton from 1994

data.event: Russell B. Cummings, a former member of the Texas House of Representatives from Harris County, operated a ranch near Hamilton from 1994 until his death in 2008 Mark Harelik, actor and playwright, was born and raised in Hamilton Louise Latham, actress, was born and raised in Hamilton.
